bio.experienceSummary:
Hi there!

I'm thrilled about the chance to be your family's nanny! I absolutely adore being around kids because they bring out the best in me. Their endless curiosity, boundless energy, and sweet imaginations make every day an adventure. There's nothing more heartwarming than seeing the world through their eyes, and I love being a part of their journey as they grow and discover new things.

I'm super flexible and always ready to lend a hand-whether that's with homework, making yummy snacks, tidying up, or just sharing some laughs together. Safety is really important to me, and while I'm working on getting my CPR certification, I've learned so much from my grandma, who's a medical practitioner, so you can trust your little ones are in safe hands.

Plus, I'm a huge fan of storytime! I love bringing books to life and making reading a magical part of the day. I can't wait to meet your kiddos and create some wonderful memories together!

Looking forward to chatting soon

description.originalText: Samuela was very patient with me. She made sure I was well taken care of. Amazing costumer service.

bio.experienceSummary: I have worked for kids in the past excellent references, fun reliable and good with kids any age, like to play do arts and crafts park movies mall all the stuff available for kids I am ok, I have my own kids one 23 the other one 12.

Hello,

My name is Sehin, and I'm a copywriter working in healthcare & I've recently returned to the NYC area and am excited to offer childcare services.

With two years of experience as a preschool teacher and nanny, I have a strong background in working with children both in daycare settings and one-on-one. I've cared for babies under a year and up to 5 years old. 
Coming from a large family, I have a deep passion for working with children. I enjoy staying active through daily walks, engaging in circle time, reading books, and exploring arts and crafts. In addition to childcare, I can assist with light housekeeping, meal preparation, and running errands.

I am committed to getting to know each child, fostering their learning through play, and supporting their development in essential life skills.

I look forward to meeting you and your little one!

description.originalText: Sehin has been an excellent sitter for my 3.5-year-old (who’s excited every time she shows up). She’s friendly, caring, and great at negotiating the whims of a kid whose favorite word right now is “no.” From reading time, to playtime, to cleaning-up-after-playtime, she’s a pro.

bio.experienceSummary: Hello, my name is Harry and I'm a 23-year-old Early Childhood Education Major. I've worked at day camps and day cares, as well as spent time in Pre-K and Kindergarten classrooms. I currently live in Clinton Hill. I've spent a lot of time in caretaker roles with children between the ages of 0 and 13, and have CPR and Mandated Reporter certifications. I'm happy to provide references and anything else you may need! I currently work at Brooklyn Nature Days.

Good afternoon, 

My name is Myriam, French native with a bachelor in psychology and child development. 

Passionate about kids since my youngest age, I naturally gravitated towards childcare and have been a nanny for the past 10 years. 

Extremely reliable, punctual and friendly, I am also able to set boundaries in a loving manner. 
With a wide range of experience with kids, from newborn to late teen years, I've also had the pleasure of working with some amazing kids very dear to my heart, with special needs
Montessori educated but always eager to learn more. 

I have great references whom are available to speak to you should you want to. 
French mother-tongue, and fluent English. 
I am CPR/First Aid certified. 
Strong driver under any weather condition with a clean record. 
I am also covid vaccinated but still very cautious.

description.displayText: Myriam was a wonderful pet sitter (bird) over the holidays. She was incredibly flexible, understanding, and it felt great to know someone was looking over our parrot. She also added an extra last minute delay after our flight  back to NYC was canceled, really appreciate her service and going the extra mile!
description.originalText: Myriam was a wonderful pet sitter (bird) over the holidays. She was incredibly flexible, understanding, and it felt great to know someone was looking over our parrot. She also added an extra last minute delay after our flight  back to NYC was canceled, really appreciate her service and going the extra mile!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hola, familias.

My name is Brenda, a passionate educator from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I've worked with children since 2015 and currently teach at Wise Wonder NYC. I also spent two years as a nanny, gaining extensive experience with newborns, toddlers, and school-aged kids. I can assist with tummy time, sleep training, and developmental milestones, and I've attended swimming classes with newborns to 3-year-olds to support early motor skills.

I have experience caring for children with special needs and have worked alongside physical therapists (PT), occupational therapists (OT), and speech-language pathologists (SLP) to support motor, sensory, and communication development. I'm First Aid certified, ensuring your child's safety is my top priority.

As a Spanish tutor, I make learning fun with stories, songs, and hands-on activities. I'm also launching weekend Spanish courses for toddlers, where little ones can explore the language through play in a warm environment.

description.originalText:
We are really lucky to have hired Melany full-time to take care of our two toddler boys. Her ability to handle even the most challenging situations with a calm demeanor has been invaluable. When the kids are being fussy with food, she comes up with adorable food art ideas to get them interested. She's extremely responsible when driving, and arranges playdates, discovers fun activities to do in our neighborhood that are beneficial for the kids.
My kids absolutely adore her and I am incredibly grateful for the positive influence she has had on my children. I would recommend her to anyone seeking the very best in childcare.

bio.experienceSummary:
Worked full-time for a family caring for a 2-year-old child, and a 10-month-old; stayed with the family until the children were 5, 3, and a newborn
Created fun and educational games, read storybooks, and planned activities such as trips to the park, library, or museums
 Utilized training in child/infant First Aid & CPR certifications to give one child her rescue inhaler for asthma attacks on multiple occasions, as well as to use the Heimlich maneuver twice on the younger child when choking
Executed a substantial amount of housekeeping, including laundry, bedroom, kitchen, and main area tidying
Organized and cooked weekly meals of lunch, and dinner when necessary
Met with parents on a daily basis to discuss plans including sport and club schedules, along with changes to all other regular routines

I'm a creative and friendly caregiver with 15 years of experience caring for children. My passion for nurturing young minds and helping them grow and develop led me to this fulfilling career. I have a special talent for making learning fun and engaging, using outdoor games, board games, and educational activities.

I believe in open and honest communication with parents and follow their preferred method to provide regular updates about their child's day and address any issues that may arise. I'm comfortable enforcing household rules as guided by the parents and prioritize their wishes for their children's upbringing.

I'm happy to assist with cooking, meal preparation, light housekeeping, travel, and supervising swimming activities. I hold a First Aid Training certification, ensuring I'm well-equipped to handle any emergencies.

I'm excited about the opportunity to connect with you and your family.

Hi! My name is Kerry I was born and raised in Jersey City. I am a Mother and a loving Aunt who has always cared for all of my Nieces and Nephews. I have always had a house full of babies/toddlers and children for many years and dedicated most of my time caring for them. I have also cared for many of my friends infants as well. I am very attentive, high energy, fun, creative and extremely responsible punctual and reliable! My experience goes back 28 years! Newborns are my absolute love! I also LOVE dogs and cats and would not mind at all if you needed help with your pets as well at no extra cost. After all they are our kids too! :) I can provide you with plenty of references if that is something that you would need. I know its difficult finding someone reliable, but with me there would be no worries! I am as down to earth as you can get. I hope you are too!

description.displayText: Kerry is the most amazing caretaker. She watched our son from 4 months old til 9 months old, when we started day care. She was punctual, helpful and so much fun. My son was SO happy to see her! She followed my schedule and helped with mommy advice when he got sick or anything happened with him in our lives. She sent me pictures and information while I was work which put me at ease. She was flexible as well! I cannot say enough good things about her.
description.originalText: Kerry is the most amazing caretaker. She watched our son from 4 months old til 9 months old, when we started day care. She was punctual, helpful and so much fun. My son was SO happy to see her! She followed my schedule and helped with mommy advice when he got sick or anything happened with him in our lives. She sent me pictures and information while I was work which put me at ease. She was flexible as well! I cannot say enough good things about her.

bio.experienceSummary: My name is Britney I go by my middle name Angèle. I am Ivorian American. I am a full time personal trainer and virtual health coach. I graduated from Towson university in 2020 with a bachelors in science where I also studied health science. I always worked alongside kids throughout my life time wether directly caring for a child or coaching them through physical activity. I started my working career by coaching gymnastics for 3 years and then going into college I nannied a family for 4 years of my undergrad degree as well as another family for a couple of months into the pandemic. Each family I work for is so unique and special. I find it my personal business to assimilate the best way I can so it makes leaving your child with me much easier. I know this profession is right for me due to my love for children. I enjoy every energetic minute of it. Outside of my professional background I am CPR and first aid certified and a proud member of the INA.
